bibl.title: The Imperial Cult in Egypt.
bibl.note: Definitions: The emperor as God. The distinction between imperial cult and emperor worship; - different forms of imperial cult in the Roman empire. - Institutions of the imperial cult in Egypt: The imperial temples; - the regional high priesthood. The 'high priest of the city'; - the high priests of Alexandria and the whole of Egypt. - A provincial imperial cult in Egypt. - The impact of the imperial cult in Egypt. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: Pfeiffer Stefan, The Imperial Cult in Egypt.
Christina Riggs (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt (Oxford, 2012) pp. 83-100.

Definitions: The emperor as God. The distinction between imperial cult and emperor worship; - different forms of imperial cult in the Roman empire. - Institutions of the imperial cult in Egypt: The imperial temples; - the regional high priesthood. The 'high priest of the city'; - the high priests of Alexandria and the whole of Egypt. - A provincial imperial cult in Egypt. - The impact of the imperial cult in Egypt. - Conclusion.
